languages.text: {n}Дрожащая рука касается {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeHealedOnTheShip}болезненных воспалений на шее{/d}.{/n} "Всю глотку кашлем сорвала, шерин. И каждый вдох — пытка похлеще друкарских ядовитых плетей. Я словно плавленный пласталь жру и неочищенным прометием запиваю". {n}Горло Джай сдавливает очередной спазм, и пузырьки крови расцветают на ее побледневших губах.{/n} "Ра-разорви меня ажи... Дожить бы до лечебниц Простора..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Дрожащая рука касается болезненных воспалений на шее.{/n} "Всю глотку кашлем сорвала, шерин. И каждый вдох — пытка похлеще друкарских ядовитых плетей. Я словно плавленный пласталь жру и неочищенным прометием запиваю". {n}Горло Джай сдавливает очередной спазм, и пузырьки крови расцветают на ее побледневших губах.{/n} "Ра-разорви меня ажи... Дожить бы до лечебниц Простора..."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae's shaking hand reaches for the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeHealedOnTheShip}painful swelling in her neck{/d}.{/n} "I've torn my throat to shreds with my coughing, shereen. Every breath in is a torture worse than the Drukhari's poisoned whips. It feels like I'm choking on red-hot plasteel and washing it down with raw promethium." {n}Jae's body is wracked by another spasm, a bloody froth bubbling from her pale lips.{/n} "A-azhi take me... Hope I make it to the Expanse's infirmaries..."
languages.original_text: {n}Дрожащая рука касается {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeHealedOnTheShip}болезненных воспалений на шее{/d}.{/n} "Всю глотку кашлем сорвала, шерин. И каждый вдох — пытка похлеще друкарских ядовитых плетей. Я словно плавленный пласталь жру и неочищенным прометием запиваю". {n}Горло Джай сдавливает очередной спазм, и пузырьки крови расцветают на ее побледневших губах.{/n} "Ра-разорви меня ажи... Дожить бы до лечебниц Простора..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae's shaking hand reaches for the painful swelling in her neck.{/n} "I tore my throat coughing, shereen. Each intake of breath is a torture worse than the toxic lashes of the Drukhari. I feel like I am choking on red hot plasteel and washing it down with unrefined promethium." {n}Jae's body is wracked by another spasm, causing her pale lips bubble with bloody froth.{/n} "A-azhi take me... Hope I can make it to the Expanse's infirmaries..."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊的手颤抖着，伸向{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeHealedOnTheShip}脖子上触目惊心的肿块{/d}。{/n}“我咳嗽得厉害，喉咙都被撕碎了，亲爱的。每吸一口气都是一场折磨，比黑暗灵族的毒鞭还厉害。这种感觉就好像被烧红的塑钢呛了一口，再用没提纯的钷素顺下去。”{n}婕伊的身体又是一阵痉挛，泛着血的泡沫从她苍白的嘴唇中冒了出来。{/n}“让鬼怪带走我吧……要是我能活着回到科罗努斯扩区的医务室就好了……”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's shaking hand reaches for the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeHealedOnTheShip}painful swelling in her neck{/d}.{/n} "I've torn my throat to shreds with my coughing, shereen. Every breath in is a torture worse than the Drukhari's poisoned whips. It feels like I'm choking on red-hot plasteel and washing it down with raw promethium." {n}Jae's body is wracked by another spasm, a bloody froth bubbling from her pale lips.{/n} "A-azhi take me... Hope I make it to the Expanse's infirmaries..."

languages.original_text: {n}Jae's shaking hand reaches for the painful swelling in her neck.{/n} "I've torn my throat to shreds with my coughing, shereen. Every breath in is a torture worse than the Drukhari's poisoned whips. It feels like I'm choking on red-hot plasteel and washing it down with raw promethium." {n}Jae's body is wracked by another spasm, a bloody froth bubbling from her pale lips.{/n} "A-azhi take me... Hope I make it to the Expanse's infirmaries..."

languages.text: {n}Jae lleva su mano temblorosa a la {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeHealedOnTheShip}dolorosa hinchazón de su cuello{/d}.{/n} «Me he destrozado la garganta con las toses, shereen. Cada aliento es una tortura peor que los látigos envenenados de los Drukhari. Siento como si me estuviera ahogando con plastiacero al rojo vivo e intentando hacer que baje con prometio puro». {n}Otro espasmo sacude el cuerpo de Jae, causando una espuma sanguinolenta en sus labios pálidos.{/n} «Q-que los azhi lleven... Espero llegar a una enfermería de la Extensión...».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's shaking hand reaches for the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeHealedOnTheShip}painful swelling in her neck{/d}.{/n} "I've torn my throat to shreds with my coughing, shereen. Every breath in is a torture worse than the Drukhari's poisoned whips. It feels like I'm choking on red-hot plasteel and washing it down with raw promethium." {n}Jae's body is wracked by another spasm, a bloody froth bubbling from her pale lips.{/n} "A-azhi take me... Hope I make it to the Expanse's infirmaries..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae lleva su mano temblorosa a la dolorosa hinchazón de su cuello.{/n} «Me he destrozado la garganta con las toses, shereen. Cada aliento es una tortura peor que los látigos envenenados de los Drukhari. Siento como si me estuviera ahogando con plastiacero al rojo vivo e intentando hacer que baje con prometio puro». {n}Otro espasmo sacude el cuerpo de Jae, causando una espuma sanguinolenta en sus labios pálidos.{/n} «Q-que los azhi lleven... Espero llegar a una enfermería de la Extensión...».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}ジェイの震える手が{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeHealedOnTheShip}首の腫れ{/d}に伸びる。{/n}「咳で喉がズタズタだ。息をするたびに、デュカーリの毒鞭よりもひどい拷問を受けたような気分になるよ。赤熱したプラスチールをのどに詰まらせ、それを生のプロメチウムで洗い流しているような気分さ」{n}ジェイの身体はまた痙攣し、青白い唇から血の泡が泡立つ。{/n}「あ、アジーがあたしを…エクスパンスの病院に行けるといいんだけどね…」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's shaking hand reaches for the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeHealedOnTheShip}painful swelling in her neck{/d}.{/n} "I've torn my throat to shreds with my coughing, shereen. Every breath in is a torture worse than the Drukhari's poisoned whips. It feels like I'm choking on red-hot plasteel and washing it down with raw promethium." {n}Jae's body is wracked by another spasm, a bloody froth bubbling from her pale lips.{/n} "A-azhi take me... Hope I make it to the Expanse's infirmaries..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイの震える手が{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeHealedOnTheShip}首の腫れ{/d}に伸びる。{/n}「咳で喉がズタズタだ。息をするたびに、デュカーリの毒鞭よりもひどい拷問を受けたような気分になるよ。赤熱したプラスチールをのどに詰まらせ、それを生のプロメチウムで洗い流しているような気分さ」{n}ジェイの身体はまた痙攣し、青白い唇から血の泡が泡立つ。{/n}「あ、アジーがあたしを…エクスパンスの病院に行けるといいんだけどね…」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jaes zitternde Hand greift an {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeHealedOnTheShip}die schmerzhafte Schwellung an ihrem Hals{/d}.{/n} "Ich habe mir die Kehle durch meinen Husten völlig zerfetzt, Shereen. Jeder Atemzug ist eine schlimmere Folter als die Giftpeitschen der Drukhari. Es fühlt sich an, als würde ich an glühend heißem Plaststahl ersticken und ihn mit rohem Promethium hinunterspülen." {n}Jaes Körper beginnt erneut heftig zu zucken. Blutiger Schaum quillt ihr aus den fahlen Lippen.{/n} "A-Azhi hole mich ... Hoffentlich schaffe ich es in die Lazarette der Ausdehnung ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's shaking hand reaches for the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeHealedOnTheShip}painful swelling in her neck{/d}.{/n} "I've torn my throat to shreds with my coughing, shereen. Every breath in is a torture worse than the Drukhari's poisoned whips. It feels like I'm choking on red-hot plasteel and washing it down with raw promethium." {n}Jae's body is wracked by another spasm, a bloody froth bubbling from her pale lips.{/n} "A-azhi take me... Hope I make it to the Expanse's infirmaries..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jaes zitternde Hand greift an die schmerzhafte Schwellung an ihrem Hals.{/n} "Ich habe mir die Kehle durch meinen Husten völlig zerfetzt, Shereen. Jeder Atemzug ist eine schlimmere Folter als die Giftpeitschen der Drukhari. Es fühlt sich an, als würde ich an glühend heißem Plaststahl ersticken und ihn mit rohem Promethium hinunterspülen." {n}Jaes Körper beginnt erneut heftig zu zucken. Blutiger Schaum quillt ihr aus den fahlen Lippen.{/n} "A-Azhi hole mich ... Hoffentlich schaffe ich es in die Lazarette der Ausdehnung ..."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae pose une main tremblante sur {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeHealedOnTheShip}l'enflure douloureuse de son cou{/d}.{/n} « Je me suis déchiqueté la gorge à force de tousser, shereen. Chaque inspiration et expiration m'inflige un supplice plus insoutenable que les fouets empoisonnés des Drukharis. J'ai l'impression que j'ai du plastacier en fusion coincé dans la gorge et que j'essaie de le faire descendre avec du prométhium pur. » {n}Son corps est secoué par une nouvelle quinte de toux et de l'écume sanglante apparaît sur ses lèvres pâles.{/n} « Que les azhi m'emportent... J'espère que je tiendrai le coup jusqu'à ce qu'on arrive aux infirmeries des Étendues... »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's shaking hand reaches for the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeHealedOnTheShip}painful swelling in her neck{/d}.{/n} "I've torn my throat to shreds with my coughing, shereen. Every breath in is a torture worse than the Drukhari's poisoned whips. It feels like I'm choking on red-hot plasteel and washing it down with raw promethium." {n}Jae's body is wracked by another spasm, a bloody froth bubbling from her pale lips.{/n} "A-azhi take me... Hope I make it to the Expanse's infirmaries..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae pose une main tremblante sur l'enflure douloureuse de son cou.{/n} « Je me suis déchiqueté la gorge à force de tousser, shereen. Chaque inspiration et expiration m'inflige un supplice plus insoutenable que les fouets empoisonnés des Drukharis. J'ai l'impression que j'ai du plastacier en fusion coincé dans la gorge et que j'essaie de le faire descendre avec du prométhium pur. » {n}Son corps est secoué par une nouvelle quinte de toux et de l'écume sanglante apparaît sur ses lèvres pâles.{/n} « Que les azhi m'emportent... J'espère que je tiendrai le coup jusqu'à ce qu'on arrive aux infirmeries des Étendues... »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae'ın titreyen elleri, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeHealedOnTheShip}boynundaki acı veren şişkinliğe{/d} uzanıyor.{/n} "Öksüre öksüre boğazımı paramparça ettim şirinim. Aldığım her nefes, Drukharilerin zehirli kırbaçlarından daha beter bir işkence. Sanki boğazıma yakıcı plasçelik takılmış da acısı dinsin diye saf prometyum içiyormuşum gibi." {n}Jae'ın bedeni bir başka spazmla bükülüyor, solgun dudaklarından kanlı köpükler çıkıyor.{/n} "A... Azhi beni yanına alsın. Umarım Enginlik revirlerine ulaşana dek yitmem."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's shaking hand reaches for the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_JaeHealedOnTheShip}painful swelling in her neck{/d}.{/n} "I've torn my throat to shreds with my coughing, shereen. Every breath in is a torture worse than the Drukhari's poisoned whips. It feels like I'm choking on red-hot plasteel and washing it down with raw promethium." {n}Jae's body is wracked by another spasm, a bloody froth bubbling from her pale lips.{/n} "A-azhi take me... Hope I make it to the Expanse's infirmaries..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae'ın titreyen elleri, boynundaki acı veren şişkinliğe uzanıyor.{/n} "Öksüre öksüre boğazımı paramparça ettim şirinim. Aldığım her nefes, Drukharilerin zehirli kırbaçlarından daha beter bir işkence. Sanki boğazıma kor plastiçelik takılmış da akıp gitmesi için saf prometyum içiyormuşum gibi." {n}Jae'ın bedeni bir başka spazmla bükülüyor, solgun dudaklarından kanlı köpükler çıkıyor.{/n} "A... Azhi beni yanına alsın. Umarım Enginlik revirlerine ulaşana kadar hayatta kalırım."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
